If using store-bought noodles, be cautious not to overcook them! Remove pot from heat as soon as they are just barely tender. The noodles will continue to cook once you remove the pot from the heat, and you don't want them mushy.
Add chicken meat from the rotisserie chicken. Taste the broth again and add more seasonings, if needed.
Store leftovers in an airtight container in the refrigerator for 4-5 days, depending on the freshness of the chicken you used.

name: Hearty Vegetable Stew
description: A recipe featuring small Onion ((minced)), clove Garlic ((minced)), rib Celery ((minced)).

ingredients.name: can Diced Tomatoes - no salt added (( 15oz))

directions: Mince the carrot, celery stalk, and small onion for the roux very fine.
Saute this mixture in ¼ cup of veggie broth until the veggies are nice and soft.
Add the large chopped onion and continue cooking until softened.
It's ok if the liquid gets a little low -- the brown bits add to the flavor.
Add the mushrooms and cook on medium high until they lose their liquid.
Season with the rosemary and italian seasoning.
Add the vinegar and deglaze any brown spots in your pan. (This is the good stuff!)
After a few minutes add the rest of the broth, the tomatoes and tomato sauce.
Add all your chopped veggies and turn the heat up to boil.
Add the rest of the seasonings -- but not the cornstarch.
Once it's boiling, turn down the heat to low and add the peas.
Mix the cornstarch with a tablespoon of cold water and stir this in to thicken.
Simmer to desired consistency.

name: West African Peanut Stew
description: A recipe featuring large onion diced, garlic cloves minced, inch piece fresh ginger.
directions: In an instant pot saute the onion, garlic, and ginger.
Add all the other ingredients except for the lime juice, greens and cilantro and stir.
Cook on high pressure for 5 minutes
Release the pressure and add the lime juice and greens.
Garnish with cilantro and roasted peanuts if using

name: Creamy Mushroom Potato Casserole
description: A recipe featuring g Mixed Mushrooms, Leek, finely chopped, Cloves Garlic, minced.

ingredients.name: Oat/Soy Cream or Coconut Milk will work

directions: Pre heat your oven to 200 degrees C.

Place a large oven proof pan or casserole dish over a medium heat & add a little oil. When the pan is hot sauté the mushrooms for 8-10 minutes, stirring often making sure they're caramelised & golden. Season with salt & pepper whilst they are cooking.

Stir through the leek, garlic, chilli, tarragon, nutmeg & the bay leaf. Cook for a few more minutes then deglaze with the brandy, if using. Cook for a couple of minutes to cook off the alcohol. Then stir through the plain flour. Cook the flour out for 1 minute then add the vegetable stock. Stir well with a spatular & bring to a simmer.

Stir through the oat cream & lemon juice. Let the mushroom filling bubble away for 10 minutes & meanwhile slice your potatoes fine using a mandolin or sharp knife. Lay the potato slices on top of the mushroom filling neatly, then drizzle over olive oil & a pinch of seasoning.
Place the pie into the oven to bake for 25 minutes or until the potatoes on top are golden and crisp.
Garnish with thyme and serve.

name: Beaker's Vegetable Barley Soup
description: A recipe featuring quarts vegetable broth, (15 ounce) can garbanzo beans, drained, (14.5 ounce) can diced tomatoes with juice.

ingredients.name: (14.5 ounce) can diced tomatoes with juice

directions: In a large pot add beans, tomatoes with juice, barley, carrots, celery, onion, zucchini, and bay leaves.
Season with garlic powder, sugar, salt, parsley, paprika, Worcestershire sauce, and pepper. Bring to a boil, then reduce heat.
Cover and simmer for 1 1/2 hours. Remove bay leaves before serving.
\*Or cook in the instant pot for 20 minutes.

name: Egg Roll Bowl
description: A recipe featuring onion diced or shredded, head Cabbage shredded, carrots grated.
directions: First, cook some brown rice
Second, cube and season your tofu and place in the oven on a silicone mat and cook at 425 degrees for 15-20 minutes.
Meanwhile, cook onion in a large wok, or pot until soft
Add the cabbage, carrots, ginger, and oil and cook until barely wilted
Add the garlic powder, soy sauce, and maple syrup and cook just 1 more minute.
Fry the wontons one by one in a small frying pan
To assemble:
In each bowl place rice, then cabbage mixture, tofu, sesame seeds, and crumble the fried wonton on top.
I like it with a little sriracha and sweet chili sauce on top.

name: Lentil Sloppy Joes
description: A recipe featuring water or low-sodium vegetable stock, onion, chopped, red bell pepper, chopped.
directions: In an instant pot add the brown rice
Cover the brown rice with water until it is 1 knuckle over
Cook on Multigrain setting for 18 minutes and quick release
Meanwhile, chop all of your vegetables and make the sauce
Sauce:
In a medium saucepan, add the cans of soup and water and whisk together, adding more water until the right thickness.
Heat just until hot, do not boil.
To assemble:
Serve the brown rice and top with the sauce and your preferred toppings.

name: Soy Curl Fajitas
description: A recipe featuring of water, bag 8 oz soy curlz, small onions.

ingredients.name: large bell peppers (red, orange, and green)

directions: Bring a medium pot of water to a boil
Turn off the heat and add half of the fajita seasoning packet and the dry soy curlz
Place a heavy bowl, or small plate on top to keep the soy curlz submerged in the water
Preheat your convection oven to 425 degrees
Let soy curlz soak for 10-15 minutes
Meanwhile, chop all of your vegetables in bite sized strips
Strain the soy curlz and try to squeeze most of the moisture out by using the back of a wooden spoon against the strainer.
Spread the soy curlz onto a baking sheet and sprinkle with the spices and soy sauce and mix well to incorporate all of the seasonings.
Bake for 15 minutes.
Meanwhile, cook all of the vegetables in a large pot over medium high heat, stirring periodically.
Add the rest of the fajita seasoning to the vegetables and stir to cook until the vegetables are just a little soft (you don't want them cooked to mush)
When the soy curlz are done, add them to the pot of vegetables and stir to incorporate all together.
Serve in a flour tortilla and top with avocado, cilantro, and the toppings you prefer. Roll like a burrito and enjoy.

name: Black Bean Burgers
description: A recipe featuring (14-ounce) cans black beans, drained, rinsed, and patted dry, (100g) finely chopped bell pepper (1/2 of a pepper), (130g) finely chopped yellow onion (1/2 of a large onion).

ingredients.name: (14-ounce) cans black beans, drained, rinsed, and patted dry
(100g) finely chopped bell pepper (1/2 of a pepper)
(130g) finely chopped yellow onion (1/2 of a large onion)

directions: Preheat oven to 325°F (163°C). Spread beans evenly onto a lined baking sheet and bake for 15 minutes until slightly dried out.

Meanwhile, sauté olive oil, chopped pepper, onion, and garlic over medium heat until peppers and onions are soft, about 5-6 minutes. Gently blot some of the moisture out. Place in a large bowl or in a food processor with the remaining ingredients (cumin, chili powder, garlic powder, smoked paprika, bread crumbs, cheese, eggs, worcestershire, ketchup, salt, and pepper). Stir or pulse everything together, then add the black beans. Mash with a fork or pulse the mixture, leaving some larger chunks of beans.
Form into patties, about 1/2 cup (130g) of mixture each, about 3/4-inch thick.

To bake: Place patties on a parchment paper-lined baking sheet and bake at 375°F (191°C) for 10 minutes on each side, 20 minutes total. To grill: Place patties on greased aluminum foil and grill 8 minutes on each side. Heat temperature is personal preference as all grills differ. Generally, black bean burgers should grill on medium-high heat about 350°F (177°C) -- 400°F (204°C).
Serve with your favorite toppings. Store leftovers in the refrigerator for up to 5 days.

name: Crust
description: A recipe featuring warm water, yeast, sugar.

ingredients.name: flour (half wheat and half all purpose)
28 oz can petite diced tomatoes, drained
6 oz can tomato paste or pumpkin puree
Pinch of sugar, salt, and pepper
vegan mozzarella style shreds, or vegan mozzarella sauce page 175

directions: In a stand mixer add the warm water, sugar, and yeast ans stir
Let rest for 10 minutes
Add olive oil, 3 cups of flour, and salt
Mix with paddle attachment for 5 minutes, or until it becomes a bit stringy.
Switch to the dough hook attachment and mix in the rest of the flour slowly until it comes together in a ball and is not too sticky to handle.
Let the dough rise in an oiled bowl for 1 hour, or until doubled.
Meanwhile, mix all of the sauce ingredients together in a bowl and set aside.
Chop any toppings you would like to go on top.
Preheat the oven to 450 degrees
Pray 2 baking sheets lightly with oil and sprinkle with cornmeal.
Divide the dough in half and roll to the edges
Top with sauce, cheese, and desired toppings
Bake 12-15 minutes until crust begins to brown and cheese is all melted.

name: Golden Curry Lentil Soup
description: A recipe featuring water (or sub half the amount in oil), thinly sliced shallot (or onion), cloves garlic, minced.

ingredients.name: water (or sub half the amount in oil)
uncooked rinsed red or golden lentils

directions: Heat a large rimmed skillet or pot over medium heat. Once hot, add water (or oil) and shallot. Sauté for 3 minutes, stirring frequently, until softened and slightly browned.
Add garlic, ginger, and serrano pepper and sauté for another 2-3 minutes. Then add carrots and a pinch of salt and stir. Cook for 1-2 minutes more, stirring occasionally.

Add vegetable broth and coconut milk and increase heat to medium high. Bring to a low boil. Then add lentils and stir. Once the mixture comes back to a low bubble, reduce heat to low or until you achieve a gentle simmer.
Add coconut aminos and curry powder and stir once more. Simmer the soup uncovered, stirring occasionally, for 12-16 minutes or until the carrots and lentils are tender.
Divide between serving bowls and garnish with fresh cilantro and lemon juice or a little fresh coconut milk or cream (optional).
Serve over rice, or with Naan

name: Thai Pineapple Fried Rice
description: A recipe featuring 1-inch chunks fresh pineapple, lime juice, pure maple syrup.

ingredients.name: oz. firm tofu, drained and cut into ½-inch cubes
dried Thai chiles (bird's eye chiles), coarsely crushed
oz. fresh shiitake mushrooms, stems removed and caps sliced

directions: In a food processor blend ¾ cup of the pineapple chunks until smooth. In a medium bowl stir together pineapple puree and the next four ingredients (through ginger). Gently stir in tofu.

In an extra-large nonstick skillet cook and stir the remaining 2¼ cups pineapple chunks and the bell pepper over medium-high 4 minutes or until pepper is tender. Stir in scallions, Thai chiles, and garlic; cook and stir 1 minute. Transfer mixture to bowl with tofu.

In the same skillet cook and stir mushroom caps, edamame, and carrots over medium-high 5 minutes. Add snow peas; cook and stir 4 minutes or until crisp-tender, adding water, 1 to 2 tablespoons at a time, as needed to prevent sticking. Add rice; stir to combine. Gently stir in pineapple mixture; heat through, stirring occasionally. Sprinkle with cilantro and serve with lime wedges.

name: Crispy Baked Tofu
description: A recipe featuring firm or extra-firm tofu, olive oil, garlic powder.
notes: If needed, you can use arrowroot instead of cornstarch, or leave it out entirely. Feel free to switch up the seasonings depending on what you plan on serving it in. For example, you can use taco seasoning, chili powder, nutritional yeast or Italian seasoning. Leave the oil out if needed. I'd recommend substituting the oil for low sodium soy sauce or tamari and leave out the salt. Best Baked Tofu delish.com Servings: 2 - 3 serving(s) Ingredients 1 (14-oz.) block extra-firm tofu, drained 2 cloves garlic, grated 1" piece ginger, grated 2 tbsp. low-sodium soy sauce 1 tbsp. Sriracha 3 tbsp. toasted sesame oil, divided 2 tsp. rice wine vinegar 2 tbsp. packed brown sugar 1 1/2 tbsp. cornstarch 1/4 tsp. baking powder 1 green onion, thinly sliced, for garnish Toasted sesame seeds, for garnish Steps 1.  Carefully pat tofu dry: On a cutting board, sandwich tofu between doubled layers of paper towels and press down slowly to remove moisture without cracking the block. Remove paper towels and cut tofu into 32 equal pieces: halve tofu laterally across, then cut the block into a 4x4 grid. 2.  Make marinade: In a medium bowl, whisk together garlic, ginger, soy sauce, Sriracha, 2 tablespoons sesame oil, vinegar, and sugar until smooth. Set aside half this mixture and reserve for glazing later. 3.  Preheat oven to 400°. Meanwhile, add tofu to bowl and toss gently to coat in marinade. Let sit 15 minutes, then drain off excess marinade. 4.  In a small bowl, whisk together cornstarch and baking powder. Sprinkle over tofu and gently toss to coat evenly. Drizzle over remaining 1 tablespoon sesame oil and toss to coat each piece. 5.  Spread tofu evenly out onto a baking sheet and bake for 15 minutes. After 15 minutes, decrease oven temperature to 375°. Flip tofu pieces to allow for even toasting, then return tray to oven and continue to bake until tofu is crispy on the outside and deeply golden, about 15 minutes more. 6.  Brush with reserved marinade mixture for a glaze finish, then sprinkle with green onions and sesame.

name: Red Beans and Rice
description: A recipe featuring onion chopped, bell pepper chopped, celery chopped.

ingredients.name: black pepper powder or to taste
small red beans soaked overnight or quick-soaked, drained
Tbs Vegan Bacon Bits, or vegan sausage

directions: Instant Pot Instructions:
Add all the ingredients into the instant pot and cook on high pressure for 30 minutes.
Serve over cooked brown rice

name: Jambalaya Pasta
description: A recipe featuring tofu (crumbled), red bell pepper diced, white onion (or yellow) diced.

ingredients.name: diced tomatoes with green chiles RO\*TEL brand
Cajun seasoning Tony Chachere's is the best!
pasta noodles we like linguine or spaghetti

directions: Add all the ingredients EXCEPT cilantro into a large pot.
Bring to a boil, stirring often.
Once boiling, reduce heat and simmer\* for about 20-25 minutes or until noodles become soft, stirring often. Add more broth if necessary.
Garnish with cilantro before serving.

name: Chicken Broccoli Wreath
description: A recipe featuring cans refrigerated crescent roll dough, chicken tofu crumbles, cooked chopped broccoli.

ingredients.name: minced garlic or a couple garlic cloves in the garlic press
tsps Mrs Dash table blend not in original recipe

directions: Preheat your oven to 375 degrees
Arrange the triangles on the large round pizza stone (see photo)
The triangles in the center will be overlapped and look a little crazy, but that's alright, though.
Use the medium scoop (the absolute best size for cookies, meatballs, and ice cream) to scoop the ingredients into the wreath.
Next, braid the triangles over the mixture, overlapping each, while tucking them underneath until all the triangles are folded over.

Bake for 25-30 minutes (according to the directions) but I keep watch until the top of the wreath is browning slightly, the crescent roll dough is nice and puffy, and the mixture is bubbly and heated through.
Slice and serve with the pizza cutter when cooled.
I chose to add hot sauce and additional seasoning to this to give it a little more oomph. I like oomph, don't you?

name: Mongolian Soy Curls
description: A recipe featuring C soy curls, TB cornstarch mixed with 1 TB of warm water, TB tamari or soy sauce if not gf.

ingredients.name: Boiling water (enough to cover soy curls)
TB avocado oil or melted coconut oil (optional)
TB cornstarch mixed with 1 TB of warm water
TB tamari or soy sauce if not gf
veggie broth (more if the sauce gets too thick)
cloves garlic minced (or sub ½ teaspoon garlic powder)
ginger minced (or sub ¼ teaspoon powdered ginger)
1 TB red pepper flakes (depending on how hot you like it)

directions: Soak soy curls in boiling water for 10 minutes (or until fully rehydrated).
Drain soy curls and press all the water out of them. I usually rinse them with cold water then wring them out with my hands. You want as much water out of them as possible.
Baking Instructions
Preheat oven or toaster over to 375 degrees.
Cover baking pan with oil so soy curls do not stick to it or use parchment paper.
Add soy curls to baking pan and bake for 15 minutes, turning a few times so that nothing is sticking to the pan.
Air Fryer Instructions
Air fry soy curls at 370 degrees for 6 minutes, shaking the basket halfway through.
While soy curls are cooking, mix sauce ingredients together, add to sauce pot and heat to a boil.
Once boiling, turn down heat and cook for a few minutes until sauce thickens just a bit. If sauce gets too thick add a bit more veggie broth.
Pour over soy curls and enjoy!

name: Red Lentil Chili
description: A recipe featuring maple syrup, garlic cloves, minced, water.

ingredients.name: tomato paste (1/2 of a small can)
better than bouillon or 1 tsp salt (to taste)

directions: Saute, onions and garlic in 1-2 tbsp of water for 5 minutes or until fragrant.
Prepare and place all of your ingredients in to the Instant Pot.
Set the cooker to pressure cook and change the time to 17 minutes. Remember to set the valve to sealing.
Once the time is complete, let it naturally release for 15 minutes. If you end up needing more chili, you can double the recipe. The recipe works fine in our 3 quart pressure cooker.
If you do this on the stove top, bring to a boil, lower heat to simmer and cover, let cook about 30 minutes or until thick.
Serve over rice.

name: Minestrone soup
description: A recipe featuring cloves garlic, chopped, onions, chopped, chopped celery.

ingredients.name: fresh or frozen green beans, cut into 1 ½-inch pieces

directions: Add all ingredients except for pasta, spinach, and parm into the instant pot.
Pressure cook for 7 minutes and quick release.
Add pasta and spinach and pressure cook for 1 more minute and quick release.
Serve topped with vegan parm.

name: Mushroom Stroganoff
description: A recipe featuring large shallots, cloves garlic, minced thyme.

ingredients.name: Tofu Sour Cream see recipe below

directions: Soak porcini mushrooms in 1 cup of boiling water for 30 minutes (save water).\*I didn't have these skipped this step added water in with the portobello mushrooms
Place the shallots in a large skillet and sauté over a medium heat for 8 minutes. Add water 1 to 2 tablespoons at a time to keep them from sticking.
Add the garlic and thyme, and cook for another minute.
Stir in the salt and pepper, rosemary, and the portobello mushrooms and cook for 10 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Add the porcini mushrooms and their soaking liquid, and the wine.\*see my note above
Stir, and cook over medium-low heat for 20 minutes.
When the stroganoff is finished cooking, stir in the tofu sour cream.
Add the cooked noodles and toss well.
Serve garnished with the parsley.

name: Spicy Coconut Curry Ramen
description: A recipe featuring toasted sesame oil divided, shiitakes torn, garlic cloves grated.

ingredients.name: sambal or other chili paste, more or less to taste
can (14.5 oz/400 g) unsweetened coconut milk full fat

directions: Get the prep done before you start cooking: grate the garlic and ginger. Tear the shiitakes into small pieces.
Heat 1 tbsp sesame oil in a large pot over medium. Add shiitakes, and cook until they start to brown. Sprinkle with 1 tbsp sesame oil, season with salt and pepper, cook until crispy. Remove from pot.

Reduce the heat to low. Again, add 1 tbsp sesame oil, garlic and ginger. Cook until fragrant, about 1 minute. Deglaze the pot with chicken broth, stir with a wooden spoon while scraping up the brown bits on the bottom of your pot. Bring to a boil.

Add turmeric, brown sugar, soy sauce and fish sauce. Stir in red curry paste and sambal. Add coconut milk and squeeze in lime juice. When the broth starts to boil, add ramen noodles and cook for 2 minutes ( If not serving right away, cook the ramen noodles separately otherwise they'll soak up the broth).
Serve immediately finished off with shiitakes, sesame seeds, chives and chili oil. Top with eggs, enjoy!

name: Refried Beans
description: A recipe featuring dried pinto beans, sorted (roughly 4-5 cups, I use 5 cups), chopped onion, -5 garlic cloves, roughly chopped.

ingredients.name: dried pinto beans, sorted (roughly 4-5 cups, I use 5 cups)
vegetable shortening (or bacon grease or lard for non-vegan)
vegetable broth (or chicken broth for non-vegan)

directions: In a medium bowl, add the white beans. Mash the beans with a fork or a potato masher until broken down. Make sure that all of the beans are broken down but also that the mixture is not too smooth as the beans will help add texture to the nuggets. Add in 1 cup vegan chicken broth along with 1/2 cup water and 1 tablespoon dijon mustard. Mix together until uniform and set aside.
In a large pot, add the remaining 7 cups of vegan chicken broth along with the chopped onion, garlic cloves, and bay leaf. Bring to a boil.

While the broth mixture comes to a boil, continue preparing the nuggets. In a large bowl, add the vital wheat gluten, nutritional yeast, garbanzo bean flour, garlic powder, onion powder, poultry seasoning, salt, and black pepper. Whisk together until uniform, and then pour in the bean mixture. Using a wooden spoon or spatula, combine until a dough-like consistency is reached. Switch to using your hands to knead the dough until it becomes soft and stretchy.

Separate the dough into 40 chicken nugget pieces. You can weigh out the pieces to be sure they are even, but we just eyeballed it. Flatten each piece and stretch them out a bit (refer to video) until each piece is about 2″ x 1.5 " x 1/2 ".

Once the broth has come to a boil, drop in the nugget pieces and mix through with a spoon to evenly disperse the onions and garlic. Low the heat to a simmer and allow the seitan pieces to simmer for 45 minutes. Mix occasionally to be sure the top does not dry out.

As that cooks, grab two small mixing bowls. In the first, add in the almond milk and vinegar for the vegan buttermilk and whisk together until uniform. Allow for this to set for 15 minutes to allow the almond milk to curdle into "buttermilk". In the second bowl, mix together the all-purpose flour, panko breadcrumbs, onion powder, garlic powder, salt, and black pepper. Whisk together until uniform and set both aside.
Once the seitan has finished boiling, strain the broth and discard of the onion, garlic, and bay leaf. Allow the seitan to cool until easy to handle.
In a large pot, add canola oil (or oil of choice) until it is 2 inches deep. Heat over medium heat. You will know that the oil is ready when a pinch of flour dropped into the oil foams instantly.

It is time to batter the chicken! These are going to be double battered, which means that you will dip the seitan into the "buttermilk" and shake off any excess, and then mix it around in the dry mixture, then dunk it back into the milk, and lastly back into the dry.\
Add as many nuggets that fit without overcrowding the pan and fry until golden brown, flipping halfway through. This should take about 4 minutes on each side.
Use a strainer to remove the nuggets and place them on a wire rack or a paper towel-lined plate to drain excess oil and cool down. Continue until you have fried all of the nuggets.
Allow the nuggets to cool and then add a sprinkle of salt over them if desired. Enjoy!
notes: Original recipe from Brian Patton of The Sexy Vegan. If you do not want to deep fry, you can pan fry the nuggets as well. Just note that you may need to add more oil overtime. You can bake these chicken nuggets as well! Lay them on an oiled baking sheet after breading and bake at 400F for 15-20 minutes, or until nice and crispy. You can make these ahead of time and freeze them in an airtight freezer-safe container until serving. After cooking the nuggets, cool them completely. Warm them through in an oven at 400F for 10-15 minutes, or until crispy. To make the breading as seamless as possible, we like to wipe our hands with a wet towel/rinse our hands clean between each nugget. This prevents batter build up on our fingers and will help you get a more even coat on the nuggets! Try to fry your nuggets soon after breading to prevent them from getting gummy.

name: Seitan Sausages
description: A recipe featuring canola oil, large white onion chopped, garlic clove chopped.
directions: In a large pan with canola oil, sautée the chopped onion and garlic cloves until soft. Add the cumin and fennel seeds. Let it cook for another minute until the spices are toasted.

In a food processor, add the chickpeas, onion-garlic-spices mixture, tomato paste, salt, thyme, smoked paprika, soy sauce, and sparkling water. Pulse until it's saucy. Then add the vital wheat gluten and pulse again until it comes together in a ball.
Prepare a large pot (filled with a couple of inches of water) with a steaming basket and bring it to high heat.

Divide the seitan into 4 equal chunks. Roll and press the seitan into a sausage shape. Roll each sausage in parchment paper and aluminum foil (roll it tightly). Twist the ends so that the seitan is completely covered in foil. Add the seitan sausages into the steaming basket and let them steam for about 40 minutes, flipping them after 20 minutes.
Let them cool off a bit before removing the aluminum foil and parchment paper.
You can use them in various recipes (Hot Dogs, Corn Dogs, serve them with mashed potatoes etc.). To warm them up, cook them in a pan or contact griller. You can store them in the fridge for 3-4 days.

name: Best Chili Ever
description: A recipe featuring large onion, diced, large red bell pepper, diced, large green bell pepper, diced.

ingredients.name: 2 Tbs masa harina (optional as a thickener)

directions: Instant Pot:
Add everything to the instant pot except for refried beans ans masa harina
Cook on high pressure for 15 minutes
Stir in the refried beans and masa harina if it still needs thickening.
Stove Top:
Chop onions and peppers into a large soup pot or dutch oven
Saute in a little veggie broth until translucent and softened.
Add minced garlic and saute for an additional 30 seconds until fragrant
Add any kind of meat substitute (if using) or dry, uncooked bulgur and continue to stir for a few minutes until heated through
Add tomatoes, tomato sauce, and remaining broth
Add in spices and stir until mixed well
Add all the beans and jalapeños and stir
Sprinkle up to 1-2 Tbs of the Masa on top if you think it needs thickening. The masa adds a slight 'corn tortilla' or 'tamale' flavor to the chili.
Give the chili one more good stir and bring it to a slow boil.
Reduce heat, cover, and simmer for 15 to 30 minutes.

name: General Tso's Chkn
description: A recipe featuring flour (any kind), water, head cauliflower florets\*.
directions: Preheat oven to 450F. Take your flour and water and mix until smooth. The mixture should be about the consistency of pancake batter.
Next dip your cauliflower one by one in the flour batter and tap off the excess. Then dip into bread crumbs until evenly coated. Continue this process until all the cauliflower is covered.
Place all the cauliflower bites on a sheet of parchment paper or non stick baking pan and bake at 450F for 30 minutes.
While the cauliflower is baking we can make the sauce. Prep and measure all of your sauce ingredients and then mix well together in a bowl and set aside.

Take the cauliflower out of the oven and dip them one by one in the General Tso's sauce and place back on the baking tray. Do this process until all the cauliflower are covered in the sauce. Place back in oven for 15 minutes on 450F.
Serve over rice with vegetables and garnish with sesame seeds and a extra drizzle of sauce on top.
\* For a more filling meal use tofu chunks instead of cauliflower

name: Tofu Pineapple Curry
description: A recipe featuring coconut oil, /2" knob of ginger, finely grated, -- 4 tablespoons Thai red curry paste.

ingredients.name: 14 ounce (403 mL) can full-fat coconut milk
(142 g) canned bamboo shoots, rinsed well
16 oz (460 g) block super firm tofu, cubed
Cooked jasmine rice, for serving ( optional )
Fresh Cilantro, chopped, chopped, for serving ( optional )

directions: Aromatics: Melt the coconut oil in a large sauté pan or pot over medium high heat. Once warm, add the red curry paste and ginger and fry for 60 to 90 seconds. Then, add in the fresh pineapple and sauté for an additional 3 to 5 minutes, stirring only occasionally to help caramelize it.

Make the Curry: Pour in the coconut milk, water, sugar, and salt. Use a spoon to mix well, until the curry paste has completely dissolved. Then, add in the bell pepper, carrots, bamboo shoots, and tofu.

Simmer: Cover the pan, raise the heat to high, and bring the mixture to a simmer. Once bubbling, uncover the pan and reduce the heat to medium; simmer for 15 minutes, or until the carrots are tender, stirring occasionally.
Thicken the Curry (optional): If you would like a thicker curry, dissolve the arrowroot powder in 1 tablespoon of water, then add to the curry and stir well; this will help to create a thicker sauce.
Garnish & Serve: Remove the curry from the heat and add in the lime juice; serve warm over rice and top with cilantro. Leftovers will keep in the refrigerator for up to 5 days.

name: Black Bean Soup
description: A recipe featuring extra virgin olive oil, large red onion, chopped, large carrot, peeled and diced.

ingredients.name: (15-ounce) cans low-sodium black beans, drained and rinsed
low-sodium vegetable or chicken broth, or more??
Optional toppings: fresh cilantro, red onion, avocado, or sour cream. Plus extra lime wedges for serving.

directions: Heat the oil in a large pot over medium-high heat. Add the onion, carrot, celery, and jalapeno pepper, and cook for 4 to 5 minutes, or until softened.
Add the garlic, cumin, oregano, coriander, cayenne pepper, and salt, and stir together for another minute, until fragrant.
Add the black beans and chicken broth, stir, and bring to a boil. Reduce the heat to low, cover the pot, and simmer for 15 minutes.

Using an immersion blender, puree the soup a few times to have a mix of creamy and chunky textures. Alternatively, you can scoop out a cup or two of soup, blend it in a standard blender until smooth, and then stir it back into the pot. Then, stir in the lime juice.
Ladle the soup into individual bowls and garnish with your favorite toppings.
notes: Each serving is about 2 cups.

name: Broccoli Cheddar Soup
description: A recipe featuring med Cauliflower ((about 1 ½ cups)), Low Sodium Vegetable Broth, Frozen Broccoli.
directions: Chop all vegetables (except broccoli and po) and add to soup pot.
Add 4 cups of Vegetable Broth and bring to a boil.
Cook until vegetables are soft and then carefully blend soup using blender or immersion blender.
Stir in milk and all seasonings and mix well.
Adjust any seasonings as necessary and then add frozen broccoli
Simmer on low heat for 5-10 min until broccoli is heated through
Serve with your favorite bread or side dish

name: Sweet and Sour Tofu
description: A recipe featuring 16 ounce block of firm or extra firm tofu, pressed, and torn into 1 to 2 inch pieces\*, soy sauce, gluten free if needed, or liquid aminos or tamari, garlic powder.

ingredients.name: 16 ounce block of firm or extra firm tofu, pressed, and torn into 1 to 2 inch pieces\*
soy sauce, gluten free if needed, or liquid aminos or tamari
sugar, I use cane sugar, you can use brown or any granulated
soy sauce, gluten free if needed, or liquid aminos or tamari

directions: In a medium-sized bowl place the pressed and torn tofu pieces. Add the soy sauce and toss to coat. Add in the garlic powder, sea salt, ground black pepper and cornstarch and toss to thoroughly combine, ensuring all the tofu pieces are covered with the seasonings and the cornstarch.

Heat a pan or wok over medium-high heat, and add the oil. When hot, add the tofu and toss to crisp up on all sides until the tofu is cooked and crisped on all sides, about 5 to 8 minutes. Feel free to do this in batches if desired. Remove tofu pieces and set aside.
SWEET AND SOUR SAUCE + PUTTING IT ALL TOGETHER:
In the same pan, lower the heat to over medium-high heat, and add in the onions, pineapples and bell peppers.
Saute until the onions are translucent and the pineapples are slightly browned, about 5 minutes.
In a separate bowl, whisk together the sugar, ketchup, vinegar, water, soy sauce, and garlic powder for the sweet and sour sauce and stir together until fully combined.

Pour in the sauce over the veggies. Bring to a slight boil, then reduce to a simmer for about 5 minutes until the sauce has thickened up. Add back in the crisped up tofu, and stir to combine. Taste test and add more sugar or soy sauce if you desire. Remove from heat until needed.
Remove from heat and top with sesame seeds and chopped scallions. Serve and enjoy!

name: Mexican Potatoes
description: A recipe featuring baby yellow or red potatoes (skin on; cut in halves or quarters) All the potatoes should be uniform in size, lime juice or 4 limes + zest, Chili Powder.

ingredients.name: baby yellow or red potatoes (skin on; cut in halves or quarters) All the potatoes should be uniform in size

directions: In an instant pot, add all of the ingredients except for the lime juice and toppings.
Stir to combine, cover it with the lid, and set it to cook on highpressure for 10 minutes.

Stir in 1 tbsp lime juice. Taste and add more salt or other seasonings if necessary. Use an immersion blender to thicken the chili a little bit. Or you can remove one cup of the soup and blend it in a blender and then stir it back into the slow cooker. Leave the lid off for 10-15 minutes and it will continue to thicken.
Top each bowl with avocado, green onions, fresh cilantro, pickled jalapenos, and a sprinkle of red pepper flakes before serving.

name: Southwestern Egg Rolls
description: A recipe featuring onion, minced red bell pepper, can corn.

ingredients.name: cans cup black beans, rinsed and drained

directions: Make Tofu crumbles if needed
Heat large saucepan over medium heat. Stir in onion and red pepper. Cook and stir 5 minutes, until tender.

Mix tofu, onion,red pepper, corn, black beans, spinach, jalapeno peppers, parsley, cumin, chili powder, salt and cayenne pepper. Cook and stir 5 minutes, until well blended and tender. Remove from heat and stir in vegan cheddar, or cashew cream.
Wrap tortillas with a clean, lightly moist cloth. Microwave on high approximately 1 minute, or until hot and pliable.
Spoon 1/2 cup of the mixture into each tortilla and fold into burritos.
Place seam side down onto a sprayed cookie sheet
Broil in the oven until crisp, flipping to cook both sides.
Serve with guacamole, salsa, etc.

name: Lentil Shepherd's Pie
description: A recipe featuring ( 900 g) Yukon gold potatoes peeled and chopped, ( 80 ml) non-dairy milk unsweetened, vegan butter or oil.

ingredients.name: ( 900 g) Yukon gold potatoes peeled and chopped
dried herbs I used a mix of thyme, rosemary & parsley
( 150 g) dry green or brown lentils rinsed & drained
soy sauce or GF tamari sauce
( 250 g) tomato passata or crushed tomatoes
( 360 ml) vegetable broth or more as needed

directions: Mashed Potatoes:

Peel the potatoes (or leave the peel on and wash if you prefer). Put the potatoes in a large pot, cover with water, and bring to a boil. Simmer for about 20-30 minutes, or until the potatoes are tender (check with a knife).
Once cooked, drain, then return to the pot and allow them to steam dry with the lid off. Add dairy-free milk and vegan butter to the pot and mash until creamy. Cover and set aside.
Shepherd's Pie filling:

While the potatoes are cooking, make the filling. Heat the oil in a large pan and sauté onions, carrots, and celery for about 3-5 minutes, until they start to turn golden brown. Add the mushrooms and continue cooking for about 5 minutes, until the mushrooms have released most of their water. Then add the garlic and sauté for a further minute, stirring frequently, until fragrant.

Now add tomato paste, paprika powder, dried herbs, lentils, and flour and stir well to combine. Pour in soy sauce, and red wine, followed by the tomatoes and vegetable broth, and stir again. Cook covered for about 20 minutes, or until the lentils are tender (check package instructions) and the sauce has thickened. Lastly, stir in peas and season with salt and pepper to taste.
Assemble Shepherd's Pie:
Preheat oven to 392 °F (200 °C).

Spoon the lentil sauce into a 10x7-inch (26x18cm) casserole dish (or similar sized oven-safe dish). Then layer the mashed potatoes over it, and smooth out the top evenly with the back of a spoon. Now use a fork to rough the top up, creating your favorite pattern. Finally, brush it with a little oil or sprinkle with vegan parmesan for even more crispiness.
Bake for 20-30 minutes, or until the top starts to turn golden-brown.
Let cool slightly before serving. (The longer it cools, the more it will thicken). Enjoy!

name: Quinoa Taco Meat
description: A recipe featuring tri-color, white, or red quinoa, vegetable broth\*, water.

ingredients.name: salsa (slightly chunky is best -- I love Trader Joe's brand)
each sea salt and black pepper

directions: Heat a medium saucepan over medium heat. Once hot, add rinsed quinoa and toast for 4-5 minutes, stirring frequently.

Add vegetable broth and water and bring back to a boil over medium-high heat. Then reduce heat to low, cover with a secure lid, and cook for 15-25 minutes, or until liquid is completely absorbed. Fluff with a fork, then crack lid and let rest for 10 minutes off heat.
Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 C).

Add cooked quinoa to a large mixing bowl and add remaining ingredients (salsa, nutritional yeast, cumin, chili powder, garlic powder, salt, pepper, and oil). Toss to combine. Then spread on a lightly greased (or parchment-lined) baking sheet.
Bake for 20-35 minutes, stirring/tossing once at the halfway point to ensure even baking. The quinoa is done when it's fragrant and golden brown. Be careful not to burn!
This quinoa taco meat goes extremely well in crispy taco shells and soft taco shells, and I also think it would be perfect on nachos, taco salads, tostadas, and in enchiladas. Dream big!

name: Creamy Wild Rice Soup
description: A recipe featuring baby bella mushrooms, sliced, a large yellow onion, chopped, cloves garlic, minced.

ingredients.name: raw cashews (soaked in 1 cup water for 3-4 hours)
apple cider vinegar or lemon juice

directions: Place a large sauce pan on medium heat and add a few tablespoons of water to it. Add in your chopped onions, garlic and mushrooms and saute until the mushrooms become translucent (about 5 minutes). If you are doing this in the instant pot you can use the saute function.

While the saute is cooking. Add your cashews (with the water from it soaking), miso, nutritional yeast and apple cider vinegar into your blender and blend on high until smooth. I use a vitamix and blend for a minute until it turns to a cream like texture.

Once the saute is done add the rest of your ingredients into your pot (except the cashew cream we just made). Bring to a boil, reduce heat to a simmer, cover and cook about 30 minutes or until the rice is soft. If you are doing this in an instant pot, cook for 22 minutes on high pressure and let it naturally release.
Once its done stir and add in your cashew cream. Add some extra black pepper on top and enjoy.

name: Falafel
description: A recipe featuring dried chickpeas (I use 3 cans), baking soda, fresh parsley leaves, stems removed.
directions: If using authentic recipe:**(One day in advance) Place the dried chickpeas and baking soda in a large bowl filled with water to cover the chickpeas by at least 2 inches. Soak overnight for 18 hours until slightly soft.
Add 1 can chickpeas, herbs, garlic and spices to the high speed blender. Blend until smooth.
Use a stand mixer and potato masher to coarsely mash the rest (2 cans) of the chickpeas.
Add the blended mixture into the mixing bowl, along with the minced onion.
Transfer the falafel mixture to a container and cover tightly. Refrigerate for at least 1 hour or (up to one whole night) until ready to cook.
Scoop tablespoonfuls of the falafel mixture and form into patties (1/2 inch in thickness each). It helps to have wet hands as you form the patties.
Roll in bread crumbs
Bake at 375 degrees on a greased cookie sheet for 25 minutes, or until golden brown.
Serve with **tabouli salad, pita bread, or naan, hummus, or thousand island dressing.

name: Taco Pie
description: A recipe featuring large Yukon gold potato, cut into 16 wedges (12 oz.), taco seasoning, medium tomato, chopped.

ingredients.name: large Yukon gold potato, cut into 16 wedges (12 oz.)

directions: Preheat oven to 450°F. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper. Place potato wedges in a steamer basket in a large saucepan. Add water to saucepan to just below basket. Bring to boiling. Steam, covered, 15 minutes or until tender.
Transfer potatoes to a bowl. Add taco seasoning; toss to coat. Spread wedges in an even layer on the prepared baking sheet. Bake about 20 minutes or until potatoes are crispy around the edges.

For the Salsa Fresca, combine tomato, onion, lemon juice, ground cumin, and garlic powder in a blender. Blend to a thick sauce. Add fresh cilantro. Season to taste with sea salt and crushed red pepper.
To assemble, divide the potatoes, romaine, beans, rice, and corn among bowls and drizzle with some of the Salsa Fresca and desired toppings.

name: Black Bean, Corn, and Quinoa Salad
description: A recipe featuring vegetable broth, uncooked quinoa, frozen corn.

ingredients.name: small red bell pepper, seeded and chopped
salt and ground black pepper to taste

directions: Bring vegetable broth to a boil in a 2-quart saucepan. Stir in quinoa. Reduce heat to low; simmer, covered, until broth is absorbed, 15 to 20 minutes. 2. Remove from heat; stir in corn. Cover and let stand until corn is warmed through, about 5 minutes.

Whisk lime juice, red wine vinegar, lime zest, and cumin together in a large bowl. Whisk in avocado oil. Add black beans, red bell pepper, red onion, and cilantro. Season with salt and pepper. Stir in quinoa and corn.

name: Black Bean and Rice Enchiladas
description: A recipe featuring green bell pepper, chopped, onion, chopped, cloves garlic, minced.

ingredients.name: (15 ounce) can black beans, rinsed and drained
(14.5 ounce) can diced tomatoes and green chilies
vegan shredded Cheddar cheese or cheese sauce

directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Lightly grease a 9x13-inch baking dish.
Heat a large skillet over medium heat; cook and stir green pepper, onion, and garlic until tender, about 7 minutes.
Stir in beans, tomatoes, picante sauce, chili powder, cumin, and red pepper flakes; bring to a boil.
Reduce heat to low and simmer, uncovered, until heated through and mixture thickens, about 5 minutes.
Fold in rice and 1 cup Cheddar cheese; cook until heated through, about 5 minutes.

Spoon a rounded 1/2 cup bean mixture down the center of each tortilla. Fold sides over filling and roll up. Place enchiladas seam side down in baking dish; spoon salsa over each tortilla. Cover baking dish with aluminum foil.
Bake in preheated oven for 25 minutes. Uncover and sprinkle with cilantro and 1/4 cup Cheddar cheese. Bake until cheese is melted, 2 to 3 minutes.

name: Taco Soup
description: A recipe featuring (10 ounce) cans diced tomatoes with green chiles, undrained, can (15 oz.) diced tomatoes, diced bell pepper.

ingredients.name: (10 ounce) cans diced tomatoes with green chiles, undrained
(15 ounce) can whole kernel corn, drained
(1.25 ounce) low sodium package taco seasoning

directions: Place everything into an instant pot (except chips)
Cook on high pressure for 15 minutes
Serve with Tortilla Chips

name: Pot Pie
description: A recipe featuring small onion, chopped, garlic cloves, minced, all purpose flour.

ingredients.name: Double Recipe Easy Vegan Pie Crust
frozen mixed vegetables (carrots, corn, green beans, peas)
large russet potato, chopped into small chunks
vegan "chicken" or baked tofu, cut into chunks, optional
cashew cream, or 1 cup bechamel sauce

directions: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F.
For the Pie Crust
Make a double recipe of Easy Vegan Pie Crust. Split the dough in half.
Transfer half the pie crust dough to a 9-inch pie pan. Push it evenly into the pan, trim off any excess, and place in the fridge to cool while you make the filling.
Wrap the other ball of pie crust dough in plastic wrap and chill in the fridge as well.
For the Filling
Heat skillet. Add the onions and garlic and saute until onion is translucent, 1-2 minutes.
Whisk in the flour, vegetable broth and unsweetened almond milk. Then add the mixed vegetables, potato and vegan chicken or tofu, if using. Simmer for 5-10 minutes, until the sauce thickens.
Add cashew cream, or bechamel if using.
The Rest

Pour the filling into the pie crust lined pan. Roll out the other pie crust on a lightly floured surface, and carefully cover the pie with it. Trim any overhang, and seal the edges with a fork or your fingers. Cut a few slits in the middle of the top crust.
Bake for 45 minutes, until the crust is golden brown. Cut, serve and enjoy!

name: Easy Stir Fry
description: A recipe featuring low-sodium vegetable broth, low-sodium soy sauce (or tamari), Tbs rice vinegar.

ingredients.name: 14 oz package extra firm organic tofu (optional)

directions: Add all the sauce ingredients to a mason jar, attach lid, and shake thoroughly
If using tofu in your stir fry, press first to remove as much moisture as possible, then cut into cubes
Use a 1 qt mason jar to marinate tofu cubes with the sauce - at least 1 hour
Drain tofu and reserve sauce.
Bake or air fry the tofu - 375°F - about 20 minutes total - flipping midway
Clean mushrooms and cut in half
Add mushrooms to wok with a splash of veg broth or water - turn heat to high
Once broth begins to boil, add frozen veggies and stir-fry just a few minutes - until crisp-tender
Add baked tofu cubes and remaining sauce
Stir until sauce has thickened
Serve over your favorite rice or noodles

name: Luxurious Lasagna
description: A recipe featuring package lasagna noodles, can tomato sauce, can diced tomatoes.

ingredients.name: Pinch of sugar, salt and pepper

directions: Boil Lasagna noodles until al dente.
Mix all of the sauce ingredients and set aside
Mix all of the Ricotta ingredients and set aside
While the pasta cooks make the Bechamel
Melt the butter in a saucepan
Add the flour and cook until bubbly.
Add the spices
Wisk the soy milk in slowly and cook, whisking until it thickens into a gravy consistency.
Assemble the lasagna:
Preheat your oven to 375 degrees
Place a scoop of sauce on the bottom of a 9x13 casserole dish
Follow with a layer of 3 lasagna noodles
Top noodles with 1/3 of the ricotta mixture
Top ricotta with 1/4 of the red sauce
Repeat steps until you have 4 layers
Top with the red sauce and then the bechamel
Cover with foil and bake for 40 minutes
Uncover foil and bake uncovered for 10-15 minutes more.
Let cool for 10 minutes before cutting and serving

name: Easy Peanut Noodles
description: A recipe featuring low-sodium soy sauce, water, -2 tablespoons minced garlic.

ingredients.name: rice noodles (1/2 package Thai kitchen brand rice noodles)
to 1 tsp sriracha or other hot sauce

directions: In a small saucepan, combine all the sauce ingredients.
Heat over low heat until bubbly.
Bring about 1/2 a pasta pot of water to a boil.
Add the noodles and cook per package instructions
Microwave frozen veggies per package instructions (or add frozen veggies to the boiling pasta water if you do not want to microwave)
Drain completely, stir in sauce, and serve.

name: Bolognese with Mushrooms & Red Lentils
description: A recipe featuring medium onion, roughly chopped (1 onion yields \~2 cups or 195 g), medium carrot, roughly chopped (1 carrot yields \~1/4 cup or 60 g), large cloves garlic (4 large cloves yield \~2 Tbsp or 18 g).

ingredients.name: medium onion, roughly chopped (1 onion yields \~2 cups or 195 g)
medium carrot, roughly chopped (1 carrot yields \~1/4 cup or 60 g)
large cloves garlic (4 large cloves yield \~2 Tbsp or 18 g)
oz. whole baby bella or cremini mushrooms
oz. dry pasta, ideally a short tube shape like rigatoni or penne (gluten-free as needed)

directions: Chop the onion, carrot, and garlic finely, or chop in a food processor.
Saute the finely chopped onion, carrot, and garlic and sauté until translucent and soft, stirring occasionally.
Meanwhile, finely chop the mushrooms and add to the pan and cook for 3-4 minutes.
Add the tomato paste, sea salt, crushed red pepper flakes, crushed tomatoes, water, and lentils.

Bring the sauce to a boil and cover the pan. Reduce the heat to low and simmer for \~30 minutes, stirring about every 10 minutes, until the sauce has thickened and the lentils are tender and starting to break down. Then stir in the optional chopped basil and turn off the heat.
Meanwhile, cook your pasta while it simmers.
Can serve over Spaghetti Squash as well. Or a mix of spaghetti and squash.

name: Easy Vegan Cabbage Roll Soup
description: A recipe featuring nutritional yeast, soy sauce (gluten-free if preferred), olive oil.

ingredients.name: 12.3oz/ 350g block extra-firm tofu drained and crumbled

name: Green Chili Enchiladas
description: A recipe featuring shredded cooked soy curls, onion chopped, garlic cloves, minced.

ingredients.name: family sized can cream of soup
fresh cilantro, finely chopped, plus more for serving

directions: Follow package instructions for reconstituting the dry soy curls with hot water and chicken flavoring and soy sauce. Let soak while you prepare the sauce.
In a large saucepan, saute garlic and onion until fragrant but not brown.\ Stir in the cream of soup and add soy milk until desired consistency.
Heat just until heated through, then turn off heat.
Stir in cashew cream, cilantro, chili powder, onion powder, and paprika. Taste and adjust the seasoning with salt and pepper.
Drain and press the soy curls and in a bowl stir in 1 cup of the sauce to the soy curls.
Cover your baking dish with a thin layer of sauce.\ Warm your tortillas and fill with the soy curlz and a bit of cheddar. Roll and place in your baking dish.
Cover the rolled tortillas with the sauce and a sprinkle of more cheddar.
Cover with foil and Bake at 375°F for 15 minutes.

Then, remove the foil and bake until the cheese is melted and bubbly, about 10 minutes.\ Allow the enchiladas to cool for 5 to 10 minutes so they set up a bit in the middle. Garnish with cilantro and serve.

name: Crispy Baked Jackfruit Taquitos
description: A recipe featuring (20-ounce) cans jackfruit in water or brine NOT in syrup, onion chopped, cloves garlic, minced.

ingredients.name: (20-ounce) cans jackfruit in water or brine NOT in syrup
[[coconut sugar]{.underline}](https://www.amazon.com/365-WFM-Organic-Coconut-Sugar/dp/B08LY42T7P/?tag=minimalistbaker-20) (or maple syrup or organic brown sugar)
2 small chipotle peppers in adobo sauce (from a can\* // roughly chopped)
adobo sauce (use more or less to achieve preferred spice level)

directions: Pour Jackfruit in a strainer and shred and break apart with your hands
Thoroughly rinse the shreds
Squeeze as much water out as you can against the strainer
Sauté onion and garlic for 4-5 minutes or until onions are golden brown and softened.
Add jackfruit and the rest of the ingredients. Use just enough water to allow the spices to mix in. Cook for about 10 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Turn up heat to medium-high and cook for 3-5 minutes more to get a little extra color/texture. Then remove from heat.
Preheat the oven to 425 F
Next, warm your tortillas by wrapping them in a damp kitchen towel or paper towel and microwaving for \~30-60 seconds.
Fill the tortillas with jackfruit mix and a bit of cheddar shreds and roll up, placing seam side down onto an oiled cooking sheet.
Spray tops lightly with oil spray.
Bake for 15-20 minutes until crisp.
Serve with refried beans, vegan cheese sauce, salsa, and shredded lettuce.

name: Easy Fried Rice
description: A recipe featuring small white onion, diced, celery leaves, chopped, frozen peas.

ingredients.name: Optional ½ block firm tofu, crumbled

directions: Slice eggplant into thin rounds slightly less than 1/2 inch thick, and sprinkle each side liberally with sea salt. Arrange in a circular pattern in a colander and place in the sink to draw out the bitter taste of the eggplant.

Let rest for 15 minutes, and arrange on a clean absorbent kitchen towel. Top with another clean dish towel and lay a baking sheet on top. Place something heavy on top, such as a [[cast iron skillet]{.underline}](https://www.amazon.com/Lodge-Skillet-Pre-Seasoned-Skillet-Silicone/dp/B00G2XGC88/?tag=minimalistbaker-20), to thoroughly dry for at least 10 minutes.
In the meantime, preheat oven to 400 degrees F (204 C) and line a baking sheet with foil and spritz with nonstick spray. Also, if making pasta, bring water to a boil in a large saucepan.

Prepare your dipping stations by placing almond milk + cornstarch in one bowl; flour in another bowl; and bread crumbs + sea salt + oregano + [[vegan parmesan]{.underline}](https://minimalistbaker.com/how-to-make-vegan-parmesan-cheese/) (or nutritional yeast) in another bowl.
Once thoroughly dry, dip eggplant slices in flour, then almond milk mixture, then breadcrumbs. Arrange on the baking sheet and pop in oven to bake for a total of 20-30 minutes.
While eggplant is browning in the oven, prepare marinara. I prefer adding my tomato sauce and spices to a serving bowl and microwaving to warm, but you could also heat it on the stove. Set aside.
Once done cooking, drain pasta and cover with a towel to keep warm. Set aside.

To serve: Plate pasta and eggplant slices and marinara in a dish as a dipping sauce. Additional [[vegan parmesan cheese]{.underline}](https://minimalistbaker.com/how-to-make-vegan-parmesan-cheese/) makes an excellent topper.

name: Dairy-Free Carrot Risotto with Peas
description: A recipe featuring olive oil, small onion finely chopped, cloves garlic minced.

ingredients.name: medium carrots peeled and finely grated
fresh or frozen green peas thawed, if frozen
7 cups vegetable stock or broth warmed

directions: In a small saucepan, warm vegetable stock over low heat.
Heat olive oil in a Dutch oven or larg heavy-bottomed pot over medium heat.
Add the onion and cook until translucent. Add the garlic and cook for one minute. Add the carrots and cook for about 1 minute more.
Add the rice and stir to coat. Allow rice to cook (toast) for 2-3 minutes, stirring frequently. Add the wine and cook until evaporated, stirring often.

Add one cup of the vegetable stock and cook until absorbed. Continue adding one cup at a time, stirring every 30-seconds or so, allowing stock to be absorbed each time until rice is tender and mixture is creamy. (This will take 6-7 cups of stock, you may not use it all). Stir in the salt and peas towards the end of cooking so that they may warm.
Season with salt and pepper to taste. Serve immediately.

Yachaejeon Vegetable pancake By Maangchi Ingredients About 2½ to 3 cups of sliced vegetables: 4 green onions, cut into 1 inch long ⅓ cup leek (optional), sliced thinly 1 inch long 3 ounces zucchini matchsticks (about 1/2 cup) 1 green chili pepper (or jalapeño), optional, sliced 3 ounces onion, sliced ⅓ cup sweet potato 1 fresh mushroom (white, baby portobello, or shiitake) Also, for the pancake: ¾ cup all purpose flour ½ teaspoon kosher salt ¾ cup water vegetable oil For the dipping sauce: 1 tablespoon soy sauce 2 teaspoons white vinegar 1 teaspoon Korean hot pepper flakes (gochugaru), optional 1 teaspoon toasted sesame seeds Direct Directions M k d 6/18/25, 11:19 AM Vegetable pancake (Yachaejeon) recipe by Maangchi https://www.maangchi.com/recipe/yachaejeon 2/4 Make dipping sauce: 1. Combine soy sauce, vinegar, hot pepper flakes (if using), and sesame seeds in a bowl and mix it well with a spoon. Transfer it to a small bowl. Seat aside. Make batter: 1. Combine green onion, leek (if using), zucchini, green chili pepper (if using), onion, and sweet potato in a bowl. Add flour salt, and ¾ cup water. Mix it well with a wooden spoon. Make a pancake: 1. Heat up a large non-stick skillet over medium high heat. I use my 12 inch non-stick skillet to make one big pancake, but if your skillet is small, you can work in batches to make smaller ones. 2. Add about 2 tablespoons vegetable oil and swirl it around to coat the skillet evenly. Add the batter to the skillet and spread it out evenly. 3. Turn down the heat to medium and put the sliced mushroom on top. Gently press them in with a wooden spoon or spatula. 4. Cook for 4 to 5 minutes until the bottom turns crunchy light golden brown. Grab the handle of the skillet and twirl it around so the pancake moves and is cooked evenly underneath. 5. Turn or flip over the pancake. 6. Increase the heat to medium high and add 1 to 2 tablespoons of vegetable oil along the edges of the pancake. Lift up one edge with your spatula and tilt the skillet so the oil flows underneath the pancake.7. Cook for 3 to 4 minutes until both sides turn light golden brown, occasionally pressing down with the spatula. 6/18/25, 11:19 AM Vegetable pancake (Yachaejeon) recipe by Maangchi
Quinoa Potato Bowl (Disneyland)
Ingredients:
3 lb Potatoes
1 Tbsp Onion Powder
1 Tbsp Paprika
1 tsp cajun seasoning
½ tsp salt
½ head of cauliflower
8 oz Mushrooms
1 Tbsp soy sauce
1 tsp garlic powder
1 Tbsp nutritional yeast
1 cup Quinoa
1 ¾ cup vegetable broth
1 small package of baby greens of your choice
¼ cup cheese sauce
¼ cup Jalapeno sauce
1 tbsp lime juice
Cook potatoes in instant pot for 10 minutes
Meanwhile, chop the cauliflower into small bite size pieces in a medium sized bowl.
Chop the mushrooms into large chunks and place in the bowl with the cauliflower.
Season the bowl with the soy sauce, garlic powder, and nutritional yeast and toss to coat.
Roast in the oven on a cookie sheet at 450 degrees for 15 minutes.

Chop the potatoes into 1 inch cubes and place them in a bowl and stir until they get a bit crumbly and start to fall apart just slightly. Bake on a sprayed cookie sheet and roast at 450 degrees for 30 minutes until golden brown and crispy.
Meanwhile, rinse the quinoa and cook in the vegetable broth until all the water is absorbed, about 12 minutes.
Top the potatoes with the onion powder, paprika, cajun seasoning, and salt and stir until they are evenly seasoned.
In a large serving bowl place the potatoes, and all the other remaining ingredients together and stir until the potatoes are completely coated with the sauces.

name: Heather's Yellow Bread or Rolls
description: A recipe featuring warm water (110 degrees F/45 degrees C), date sugar, vegetable oil or aquafaba.

ingredients.name: warm water (110 degrees F/45 degrees C)

directions: Place water, sugar, and yeast into your stand mixer and mix for 10 seconds with the paddle attachment. Let sit for 5 minutes to bloom.
Add 2 cups of flour, oil, and salt, and mix on medium speed for 5 minutes until the batter begins to get stringy as the gluten develops.
Switch to the dough hook and mix in the remaining flour until the dough releases from the edges of the bowl and does not stick to your hands.
Let rise until double around 30 minutes.
Punch dough down and then shape into loaves, or rolls.
Let rise again, around 30 minutes.
Bake at 350 for 30 minutes for bread and 12-15 minutes for rolls.

name: Hummus
description: A recipe featuring 15oz can garbanzo beans, aqau faba, garlic cloves.
directions: Drain your garbanzo beans into a bowl and save the aqua faba (liquid) from the can.
Add all of your ingredients into your blender.
Blend on high for 2 minutes. You want the hummus to be very creamy and fluffy, adding aquafaba as needed to get a creamy consistency.
Place in an air tight container and store in the fridge for up to one week.
Variations:
Add roasted red bell peppers
Jalapenos
Sesame seeds and sesame oil
Roasted Garlic

name: Ann's Mushroom Gravy
description: A recipe featuring large sweet onion, chopped, cloves garlic, minced, oz. mushrooms, sliced.

ingredients.name: oat flour or whole wheat flour, optional
Freshly ground black pepper, to taste

directions: In a medium pan over medium-high heat, cook the onion. Allow the onion to brown a little while stirring, adding a splash of water to the pan if it starts to burn.
Add the garlic and mushrooms and continue cooking until the mushrooms soften, again adding a little water as needed to keep the mixture from burning.
Add 1 cup of the broth to the pan and stir.
In a small bowl, combine the remaining 1 cup of broth with the miso, tamari, and flour (if using), and stir until the miso has dissolved.
Add the miso mixture to the pan. Continue cooking until the gravy thickens to your liking.
If you want a smooth gravy, transfer to a high speed blender and blend until smooth
Season with pepper to taste. Serve warm.

name: Ranch Dressing
description: A recipe featuring 12-oz. pkg. soft silken tofu (see intro), Tbsp. unsweetened, unflavored plant-based milk, such as almond, soy, cashew, or rice, tsp. onion powder.

ingredients.name: Tbsp. unsweetened, unflavored plant-based milk, such as almond, soy, cashew, or rice
tsp. chopped fresh parsley or ½ tsp. dried parsley
tsp. chopped fresh dill or ½ tsp. dried dill weed
tsp. chopped fresh chives or ½ tsp. dried chives
Sea salt and freshly ground black pepper, to taste

directions: In a blender combine the first five ingredients (through garlic powder) and season with salt and pepper. Cover and blend until creamy and smooth. Transfer to a bowl. Stir in parsley, dill, and chives. Adjust seasoning. Chill before serving. Thin with additional milk if needed.
Keep in an airtight container in the refrigerator up to 4 days.

name: White Gravy
description: A recipe featuring tvp rehydrated, vegan butter, flour.

ingredients.name: Dash of nutmeg, red pepper flakes, fenel and thyme

directions: Brown the tvp in the butter for a few minutes in a cast iron skillet
Add the flour and spices and cook 1 minute
Wisk the milk and all other ingredients into the mixture
Continue cooking and whisking until thickened
It will continue to thicken as it cools.
Serve over biscuits with some strawberry jam

name: Skinny White gravy
description: A recipe featuring C unsweetened almond milk, t chicken bullion, T all purpose flour.

ingredients.name: t garlic salt (more or less to taste)

directions: Whisk all ingredients with cold milk in a small sauce pan until completely smooth.
Turn on heat to medium and bring to a simmer.
Turn down heat and let simmer about 1 minute and keep whisking while it simmers. Turn off heat and set aside until ready to use. It will thicken a little more while it sits.
Mom's Potato Salad
5 large potatoes

name: Naan Bread
description: A recipe featuring instant yeast, warm water, [[granulated sugar]{.underline}](https://amzn.to/2LfRABt).

ingredients.name: Optional: melted vegan butter for serving, minced garlic or fresh herbs

directions: Add the yeast and sugar to a large bowl and pour the warm water on top (think bath temperature, not too hot or it will kill the yeast). Let sit for a few minutes until it is frothy on top.

Now add the flour, salt, baking powder, coconut cream and olive oil. Stir with a wooden spoon until it becomes difficult, then turn the ball of dough out on a lightly floured surface (I just use my countertop). Knead the ball of dough for about 2-3 minutes, until the ball of dough is smooth and soft. If it is too sticky, add a little more flour.
Place the dough in a large bowl, cover with a tea towel and let it rise for about 30 minutes. If you are in a hurry, you can skip the rising part. It will still come out quite good!
After it rises, flatten the dough and divide into 8 pieces.

Heat a large, heavy bottomed pan (cast iron preferred) over medium heat. Take a piece of the dough and roll it on a lightly floured surface into a circle or oval shape (about 1/4 inch thick). If using garlic, gently press a little minced garlic onto one side so it sticks at this point.
Place the dough on the heated pan and cook until large bubbles have formed and the bottom is golden brown. Flip and cook 1-2 minutes more until that side is golden brown as well.

Repeat with the remaining pieces. Cover the naan with a towel or wrapped in foil to keep warm until ready to serve. Serve plain or brush with melted vegan butter and sprinkle with fresh herbs, such as cilantro or parsley.

name: Jamie's Cranberry Spinach Salad
description: A recipe featuring butter, almonds, blanched and slivered, spinach, rinsed and torn into bite-size pieces.

ingredients.name: spinach, rinsed and torn into bite-size pieces

name: French Bread
description: A recipe featuring cornmeal, all-purpose flour, (.25 ounce) packages active dry yeast.

ingredients.name: warm water (110 degrees F/45 degrees C)

directions: Grease a large baking sheet and sprinkle with cornmeal. Set aside.

Combine 2 cups flour, yeast, and salt in the bowl of a stand mixer. Stir in 2 cups warm water; beat with the dough hook attachment until blended. Continue adding remaining flour, a little at a time, until incorporated.
Knead dough on a lightly floured surface until smooth and elastic, 8 to 10 minutes. Shape into a ball, place in a greased bowl, and turn once.
Cover and let rise in a warm place until doubled in size, about 1 hour.
Punch dough down and divide in half.
Turn out onto a lightly floured surface. Cover and let rest for 10 minutes.
Roll each half into a large rectangle. Roll up, starting from a long side. Moisten edge with water and seal. Taper ends.
Place loaves, seam-side down, on the prepared baking sheet.
Lightly beat egg white with 1 tablespoon water and brush over loaves.
Cover with a damp cloth and let rise until nearly doubled, 35 to 40 minutes. Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
Use a sharp knife to make 3 or 4 diagonal cuts, about 1/4-inch deep, across top of each loaf.
Bake in the preheated oven for 20 minutes.
Brush loaves with egg white mixture.

Continue baking until an instant-read thermometer inserted into the center reads 190 degrees F (88 degrees C) or loaves sound hollow when tapped, 15 to 20 minutes more. If necessary, cover loosely with foil to prevent over-browning.
Remove loaves from the baking sheet and cool on a wire rack.

name: Homemade Fries
description: A recipe featuring Potatoes, Onion Powder, Garlic Powder.
directions: Spray 2 cooking sheets lightly
Slice the potatoes into 8 or more wedges
Dump the wedges onto each cooking sheet and spray lightly with oil.
Sprinkle the spices over the potatoes and toss them to evenly coat
Spread the wedges evenly on the cooking sheets
Bake in the convection oven at 450 degrees for 25-35 minutes, or until golden brown and cooked through

name: Roasted Brussel Sprouts
description: A recipe featuring chopped Brussel sprouts (300 g), date paste or maple syrup, soy sauce.

ingredients.name: balsamic vinegar (try it with different flavors!)

directions: Add ingredients to a Ziplock bag or large bowl.
Mix every together and let Brussel sprouts marinate for around 10 minutes.
Preheat oven to 425 degrees.
Spread Brussel sprouts out evenly.
Cook on a parchment-lined baking sheet for 15-20 minutes.
Notes: Chopped raw walnuts and dried fruit pair incredible in this dish after Brussel sprouts are cooked.

name: Oven Roasted Potatoes
description: A recipe featuring red potatoes, large diced, minced rosemary, onion powder.
directions: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C). Spray a baking sheet with cooking oil Toss the potatoes with the spices and spread evenly on the baking tray Spray the potatoes lightly with oil Bake in the preheated oven for 30 minutes, or until golden brown. Serve immediately.

name: Garlic Smashed Potatoes
description: A recipe featuring baby yellow potatoes, cloves garlic, minced, thyme.

ingredients.name: Kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper, to taste

directions: Cook potatoes until almost soft in the instant pot for 7 minutes on a trivet over 1 cup of water.
Preheat oven to 450 degrees F. while the potatoes cool slightly.
Lightly oil a baking sheet with nonstick spray.

Place potatoes onto the prepared baking sheet. Using a flat dry measuring cup or glass, carefully smash the potatoes until flattened but still in one piece. Top with olive oil, or spray, garlic and thyme.
Bake for 25-30 minutes, or until golden brown and crisp.
Serve immediately.

name: Pita Bread
description: A recipe featuring warm water, flour, sugar.
directions: Into the bowl of a stand mixer add water, yeast, sugar, and 2 cups flour and mix together. Let sit for 10 minutes
Add olive oil and salt
Add enough of the flour to make a thick cake batter consistency and mix for 6 minutes, or until stringy
Add the rest of the flour until a soft ball forms that is not too sticky
Spray and let rise until doubled about 1 hour
Roll into desired size ¼ inch thick and place on a floured surface
Let rest until puffy around 10-30 minutes
Cook on a preheated griddle until browned and puffed

name: Mexican Rice
description: A recipe featuring uncooked long-grain rice, garlic salt, ground cumin.
directions: For the croutons:
Preheat oven to 375 degrees.
While your oven preheats, cut up the bread into small cubes.
Add olive oil, garlic powder, basil, and salt to the bread and mix well together.
Pop bread into the preheated oven and bake it for 10 minutes or until it's nice and crispy.
For the roasted chickpeas:
Take the skin off the chickpeas by rolling them on a paper napkin (NOTE: I'm not sure if this is a necessary step, so feel free to skip it if you like)
Add a little bit of oil to a frying pan and add in the chickpeas. Roast until they're nice, brown, and crispy on the outside. (NOTE: You can roast the chickpeas in an oven, too.)
To prepare the bok choy:
Wash the bok choy or baby bok choy.
Chop into small pieces and set aside.
For the vegan caesar dressing:

In a small bowl, mix together vegan mayo, lemon juice, dijon mustard, maple syrup or agave nectar, nutritional yeast, garlic powder, and black pepper. (Feel free to add in more of the ingredients if you like)
And now for the assembly:
Place the baby bok choy, roasted chickpeas, and croutons onto a bowl.
Add your vegan caesar dressing.

name: Del's Potato Salad
description: A recipe featuring medium red potatoes, scrubbed and chopped, (12-ounce) package firm or extra-firm silken tofu, prepared yellow mustard.

ingredients.name: medium red potatoes, scrubbed and chopped
(12-ounce) package firm or extra-firm silken tofu

directions: Place the potatoes in a large pot and add cold water to cover. Bring the water to a boil over medium-high heat, then reduce the heat to medium-low and simmer the potatoes until just tender, 8-10 minutes. Drain the potatoes in a colander and rinse them under cold water until cool.
In a blender, combine the silken tofu, yellow mustard, Dijon mustard, garlic, lemon juice, and salt. Blend until smooth and creamy.
Transfer the mixture to a large bowl, add the relish, and stir well to combine. Add the celery, onion, and potatoes and toss gently to combine. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Cover and chill for 1 hour. Taste and adjust seasoning before serving.
Store the salad in an airtight container in the refrigerator for up to 1 week.

name: Potato Cheese Sauce
description: A recipe featuring potatoes, peeled and roughly chopped, peeled carrots, diced, of small-sized onion roughly chopped.
directions: Boil the potatoes, carrots, and onion until soft -- usually 15-20 minutes. Once they're finished drain them and add to your blender.

Place all the remaining ingredients in your blender and blend until the cheese dip is smooth and creamy. If it's too thick you can add a little more water while you're blending. You shouldn't have to heat up on the stove as the veggies will still be hot.
Pour into a bowl and enjoy.
Store leftovers in airtight container up to a week.
Optional
Stir in one can of diced tomatoes and green chiles for a tex-mex kick.

name: Melty Mozzarella
description: A recipe featuring raw cashews, softened (see step 1), water, + 2 teaspoons tapioca starch (also called tapioca flour).

ingredients.name: + 2 teaspoons tapioca starch (also called tapioca flour)

directions: Softening the cashews:

Softening the cashews first helps them blend. If you have a high-powered blender you may be able to skip this step, but if not, this step is important to get a smooth cheese. You can either boil or soak the cashews. To boil the cashews (the fast method): add the cashews to a small pot, cover with water, and boil for about 10 minutes until the cashews are very tender. To soak the cashews: add the cashews to a bowl, and cover with water. Let soak for 4 hours or overnight until tender. Drain and rinse cashews before using.
To make the vegan mozzarella:
Add the cashews along with the 1 cup of water and all the remaining ingredients to a blender. Blend until completely smooth. It will be very watery.

Pour into a small saucepan and put over medium-high heat. Continually stir. The cheese will start forming clumps, keep stirring and it will continue clumping until the mixture turns from watery to a thicker melty cheese sauce. This takes about 5 minutes. Serve hot or allow to cool and store in an air-tight container in the fridge for 2 - 3 days. The cheese will get thicker as it cools but will stay in a melty state.

name: Spinach Artichoke Dip
description: A recipe featuring batches Melty Stretchy Gooey Vegan Mozzarella (can be made in advance or right before making the dip), marinated artichoke hearts (1 ½ cups), drained and roughly chopped, yellow onion finely chopped.

ingredients.name: batches Melty Stretchy Gooey Vegan Mozzarella (can be made in advance or right before making the dip)
marinated artichoke hearts (1 ½ cups), drained and roughly chopped
frozen spinach (or 2 large handfuls fresh spinach)
plant-based milk (such as oat or soy), plus more if needed
Bread, chips, veggies, or whatever you want to use to dip!

directions: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C).

Make a double batch of Melty Stretchy Gooey Vegan Mozzarella. You can do this ahead of time and keep the mozzarella in an airtight container in the fridge until you are ready to use it, or you can make it right before creating this recipe. It only takes 15 minutes!

Add the mozzarella to an oven-safe dish, along with the artichoke hearts, onion, garlic, spinach, ½ cup non-dairy milk, salt, and pepper. Give it a stir. It will probably be lumpy and not really come together, but that's ok.
Bake for 20 minutes, stopping halfway to give it a stir. If it gets too thick, thin it by mixing in a bit more plant-based milk.

Once fully cooked, you can optionally brown the top. To do this, turn your oven to broil, and put it under the broiler for about 3 minutes. Check continuously so that it doesn't burn, it browns fast!! Serve hot with bread or chips.

name: Balsamic Salad Dressing
description: A recipe featuring balsamic vinegar, Dijon mustard, nutritional yeast.

ingredients.name: sea salt and freshly ground black pepper

directions: Combine all ingredients with 2 teaspoons water in a jar or Tupperware container.
Close lid, and shake for a few seconds to mix well.

name: Guacamole
description: A recipe featuring ripe Hass avocados, cloves garlic, medium red onion.

ingredients.name: kosher salt, plus more to taste
fresh lime juice (squeezed from 1 large lime)

directions: Roughly chop the garlic cloves. Once the garlic has been chopped, sprinkle 1/2 teaspoon of salt over it and crush the salt and garlic together by dragging the flat side of your knife over the mixture. This step should take no more than 1 to 2 minutes.
Mince the red onion and jalapeño pepper.

Slice and scoop out the avocado, then add it to a large bowl. Mash the avocado lightly with a fork, but leave it a little chunky for now. The avocado will become smoother once you mix everything together.\ Add the garlic paste, red onion, jalapeño pepper, and cilantro to a large bowl.\ Pour the lime juice into the bowl and fold the ingredients together, gently, until everything is mixed. Taste the guacamole and add more salt, to taste.
Cover and store:

If you don't intend to eat the guacamole right away, press a piece of plastic wrap directly onto its surface, and cover the bowl with a lid. Keep the guacamole refrigerated for up to 3 days. The surface of the guacamole might still brown, but just scrape the top off to reveal the bright green guac below!

name: Salsa Fresca (Pico de Gallo)
description: A recipe featuring finely chopped red onion, limes, juiced, Roma (plum) tomatoes, seeded and chopped.

ingredients.name: jalapeño pepper, seeded and finely chopped - or more to taste

directions: Mix red onion, jalapeño pepper, and lime juice in a bowl. Allow to stand for 5 minutes. Mix in tomatoes, cilantro, and salt; allow to stand 15 more minutes for flavors to blend.
Cook's Note
There are two tricks to this recipe:
Hand-chop everything. It takes a while, but it is worth it.
The marinating is what makes this salsa special.
Nutrition Facts

name: Mom's Flour Tortillas
description: A recipe featuring all-purpose flour, kosher salt, baking powder.
directions: Combine flour, salt and baking powder in the bowl of a stand mixer. Using the dough hook, mix dry ingredients until well combined.

Add oil and water with mixer running at a medium speed. After about 1 minute, or when mixture comes together and begins to form a ball, decrease mixing speed to low. Continue to mix for 1 minute or until dough is smooth.

Transfer dough to a lightly floured work surface. Divide into 16 equal portions. Turn each piece to coat with flour. Form each piece into a ball and flatten with the palm of your hand. Cover flattened balls of dough with a clean kitchen towel and allow to rest for at least 15 minutes (or as much as 2 hours) before proceeding.

After the rest period, heat a large pan over medium heat. Roll each dough piece into a rough circle, about 6-7 inches in diameter, keep work surface and rolling pin lightly floured. Don't stack uncooked tortillas on top of each other or they will stick together. (I like to separate my tortillas with parchement paper.)

When the pan is hot, place one dough circle into the pan and allow to cook 45 seconds to 1 minute or until the bottom surface has a few pale brown spots and the uncooked surface is bubbly. If browning too fast, reduce the heat a bit. If it's taking longer than a minute to see a few pale golden brown spots on the underside of tortillas, increase the heat a bit. Flip to other side and cook for 15-20 seconds.

name: Sheet Pan Roasted Vegetables
description: A recipe featuring broccoli florets, zucchini or a combination of zucchini and yellow squash, large red bell pepper.

ingredients.name: zucchini or a combination of zucchini and yellow squash
Aquafaba -- the bean broth from cooked garbanzo beans
rounded teaspoon Cumin Seeds -- the whole seed not cumin powder
crushed red pepper flakes or to taste
